Function reference

All functions

assemble_TOP_logistic_training_data()
Assemble TOP (logistic version) training data for all TF x cell type combos, then split training data into partitions #'
assemble_TOP_training_data()
Assemble TOP training data for all TF x cell type combos, then split training data into partitions
bam_sort_index_stats()
Sort and index the BAM file, and then retrieve and print stats in the index file.
bin_dnase()
Binning and transform DNase count matrix
combine_TOP_samples()
Combine and take the average of TOP posterior samples from all partitions
combine_dnase_bins_chip_data()
Combined normalized and binned DNase data with normalized ChIP counts data
compute_mapability()
Title
count_dnase_genome_cuts()
Count DNase-seq or ATAC-seq cleavage for a given genome.
count_normalize_chip()
Count and normalize ChIP-seq read coverage
extract_TOP_coef_samples()
Extract alpha and beta coefficients from TOP posterior samples
extract_TOP_mean_coef()
Compute TOP posterior mean coefficients for all three levels of TOP model
filter_blacklist()
Filter sites in ENCODE blacklist regions
fit_TOP_M5_model()
Fit TOP model
fit_TOP_logistic_M5_model()
Fit TOP logistic model
flank_fimo_sites()
Get candidate sites using FIMO motifs with flanking regions
get_dnase_sites_counts()
Get DNase count matrices for candidate sites.
get_total_reads()
Get total number of mapped reads from the idxstats file generated by samtools
load_TOP_samples()
Load TOP posterior samples
merge_normalize_dnase_counts()
Merge DNase counts, then normalize merged DNase counts data.
millipede_binning()
Count DNase cuts with different MILLIPEDE binning settings.
normalize_bin_dnase()
Normalize, binning and transform DNase counts
normalize_chip()
Normalize and transform ChIP counts
normalize_dnase()
Normalize DNase counts
predict_TOP()
Predict quantitative TF occupancy or TF binding probability
predict_TOP_logistic_mean_coef()
Predict TF binding by TOP logistic model with posterior mean of regression coefficients
predict_TOP_mean_coef()
Predict TF occupancy using posterior mean of regression coefficients
predict_TOP_samples()
Predict TF occupancy using posterior samples of regression coefficients
process_candidate_sites()
Full process to get candidate sites from FIMO result
rev_count_bwtool()
Flip the counts generated from bwtool for motifs on the reverse (minus) strand
select_model_coef_mean()
Select TOP model hierarchy level
sort_merge_overlap_bedgraph()
Sort and merge the overlapping sites, remove the overlapping sites with lower occupancy
track_def_line()
Set genome browser track parameters for predictions in bedGraph format
